system.effect: To Activate, bridge crew make opposed +20 Tech-Use Test vs Opponents +0 Detection+Scrutiny Test. To try to pretend to be a larger ship to sensors. Replicating specific ship signature incurs -20 penalty to test. Visual Inspection clearly identifes the vessel. Poor Versions can't replicate specific vessels, Good provides +10 to Test, Best also has two specific vessels programmed in that can be replicated without penalty. Only one per vessel.
